website_summaries.verdict: Hard-exterior massage ball with high-intensity vibration. A versatile and compact product endorsed by professional athletes.
pros: Digital circuitry controls and three speed settings
Treats muscle issues in various body regions
Hard exterior permits vibrations to penetrate to deeper muscle layers
Tested and endorsed by a number of pro athletes
cons: Some complaints that unit shuts off unintentionally during use because power button isn't recessed enough

customer_reviews.title: No customer service at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chiropractor who has directed several patients to purchase this. Excellent product until it malfunctions and then good luck getting customer service on the phone. It's been a month of calling daily to no avail. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This lasted only a few months. Used about a dozen times. When I contacted the company they did not get back to me at all. On button broke and fell into the ball. No longer functions. $148 is just wrong for poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ughhhhhh...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this product. But like many have mentioned before, after several uses it would not hold a charge. I also noticed the ball would become hot which concerned me. I followed the charging instructions when I first received this. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RNRMOM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews. This product worked for essentially two months and then abruptly stopped working. I called the company which had me on hold for over an hour and they refused to exchange or take the product back. I have been a practicing chiropractor for 30 years and we stand behind our treatment, anything we sell, or any product that we recommend. This is my first review of any product in my life. I felt strongly enough to inform anyone else who might think this device or this company has any merit to it. Look elsewhere for similar products from another company.
customer_reviews.author: James Kontaratos

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my husband whose back is always hurting. It works like a charm! Great tool for the back and I've used it before for my hamstring and legs. A little expensive, but...it is nice quality, three speeds, and it is a nice device. The top speed is super strong, against a wall it will definitely make lots of noise like its rocking down the house. We use this on the floor and it works great. All in all happy with this purchase as its a great tool to help with muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every athlete
customer_reviews.text: I know the price looks steep, but it's 10000% worth it! The price for a massage alone is probably around the cost of the hypershere, except with this, you can use it again and again. You definitely get your moneys worth. As a competitive weightlifter, this is a must-have and all my friends constantly ask to borrow it... I'm in school in Canada and since hyperice isn't based here (look at that exchange rate...)and my friends dont wanna pay the shipping costs and duties, they use mine. Definitely makes the recovery process much faster!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Only problem.... The power button turns on/off when rolling on it.
customer_reviews.author: crazymom

customer_reviews.title: Ball tends to break apart during everyday use
customer_reviews.text: The vibration of this product is very good-the construction of the ball itself is not. The ball tends to pull apart after repeated use and then goes haywire! Customer service is almost non existent-it took multiple calls and e-mails for return information. I use this product every day for stretching so the turn around time to get another Hypersphere was so long I had to but another one. It's been over a week since I shipped my defective product back-Not Impressed with the quality, design, and effort it takes to return the product. Hopefully my new Hypersphere is not defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexplicably Broke.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this a great review but it's one months later and I went to use my hyperice hypersphere And basically it is making a very strange sound Like something is broken inside. I am pretty disappointed After having paid so much for it. I wouldn't recommend this product. I am still checking with the company about reimbursement or getting a new one so I will decide whether I can recommend it after that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: First one we received was already broken on inside. We could hear pieces shaking around. We returned for a replacement, thinking we just got a bad one. It broke within one week of use. And we were very careful to not drop it. We’ve decided there must be a design flaw. The ball is so good at vibrating that it loosens the parts on the inside until it breaks. Don’t waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We loved our hyperice unfortunately the customer service was terrible. Ours stopped charge one month after the warranty was out and they wouldn’t honor replacing it. We’ve bought several items from them and this was the first time one of them died so quickly (about 13 months of gentle use). For such an expensive device, a functional life of 13 months is completely not worth it. I will not purchase from hyperice again not because their tools aren’t great but because they do not last and the company is not willing to replace a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: This product was the worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This product was the worst purchase ever...it lasted 2 months and the company refused to repair or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Pateva

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with results!!
customer_reviews.text: This ball in conjunction with intensive physical training and rehab, has helped cure cubital nerve damage in my arm that has taken 12 years, 6 surgeries, over a dozen injections and more pills than I ever thought possible!! This hypersphere is the best device and is unmatched in how well it battles pain!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McCann

customer_reviews.title: Backs Reliever
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Has muiltiple settings so you can adjust the strength and speed. The vibration is strong, so as with any massage technique, we sure to avoid pressing this right against your spin. Working the muscles around the spin is fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lim

customer_reviews.title: A neighbor of mine recommended this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner and often have tight hips and hamstrings. A neighbor of mine recommended this product. I absolutely love it. It has helped my soreness and overall tightness. I roll my feet, legs, back, hips. It's wonderful. I have a foam roller but it just can't get to certain areas that the sphere can. I even bought one for my 60 yr old mom and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: megant

customer_reviews.title: It's great, the battery lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: It's great, the battery lasts a long time. I'm not sure if I'm just getting used to it or if the vibration gets weaker over time, probably just getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month and then something broke on the inside and now it is extremely loud to use. Unfortunately I’m outside of my return window now. Expensive purchase for only a month worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was working great but it’s been acting funny lately
customer_reviews.text: It was working great but it’s been acting funny lately. Sometimes it would change settings when I didn’t touch the button, or it would shut off randomly. It seems to have a mind of its own. Now when I turn it on it jumps to the highest setting & I can’t then it off now matter how much I’m holding down the button & it won’t change speeds when I just push the button. This was kinda expensive, I was hoping it would work longer than this??? Please help!!!
customer_reviews.author: amy yamagishi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING. Knots and tension throughout my neck/shoulders gone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. Knots and tension throughout my neck/shoulders gone. In PT for this reason, they tried using it during a session and I had an immediate response (good) to it. Bought it...and the second I feel any tension in neck/shoulder, usually while sitting at my desk, I lay down on the ball 10 mins tops and it relieves the pain. Worth the cost, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer after using it at my physical therapist. This ball was a huge help with nerve pain in my leg. It was actually the only thing that gave me relief for about 6 months. Now that I’m not dealing with nerve pain, I use it to get knots out of my legs. The vibrations are pretty strong, so I would recommend using it on carpet or a mat. I keep it in my basement, because it makes too much noise upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is much better than just a normal foam roller. Also if you turn the vibration all the way up, you will basically shake your house down. Solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: mk3

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because of the price but after reading about it I decided to not let the price control my pain. I would definitely recommend this product. VERY strong vibration to say the least it will bounce off the floor by itself lol
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: Just as in the third video Brutal, the shipping box was in fine shape. Charged up the sphere and upon turning it on it sounded like an old Evinrude boat motor! My trainer has one that just hums, but this one drowned out the tv I was watching ten feet away. Sending back, and not sure if I'll re order based on mixed reviews.
customer_reviews.author: James R Dedmon

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well initially, but after 3 months of use the internal vibrating bit went out of alignment somehow and now it makes a dreadful noise and isn’t an even vibration. The top level sounds like a lawn mower :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Everything lit up like normal, just no more vibrating
customer_reviews.text: Mine stopped working a few days after my time was up to return it. Literally used it 4 times. Went to use it again. Everything lit up like normal, just no more vibrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using one during PT. Nothing gets my knots out better - period. If you are active, recovering from surgery, or want to open up your range of motion, this ball will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worth about 20 bucks, if that. Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: First review I’ve written. I’ve now learned to read comments. I got this item due to using an actual working one at my physical therapist office after having hand surgery. It seems now that luck had its play in them finding one that works. The first one I bought lasted about two months of infrequent use and started making an absolutely horrible and really loud sound. I figured I must have dropped it or something without knowing it or remembering it or something along those lines. The second one was making that sound right out of the box. Fool me once shame on you, fool me twice I should’ve read the comments.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCharlesMay

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my bad back. Have noticed it definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my bad back. Have noticed it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. I have had shoulder problems for 1 year. Been through PT an chiropractic. Two days of this product have made a HUGE difference. You do need padding on your wall or floor to use this. Like a yoga mat. Thank you for making it, Hyperice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would give this a 0 star if possible.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Product stopped working after 4 uses, but was outside of Amazon's Return "Policy"  - So I am being charged a $30 restocking fee by Amazon and I have been told there is no way around this. An utter and complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Curry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for sore muscles!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product for back legs and even shoulders. I have tendinitis in my shoulder and I lay on this for ten minutes a day to loosen it up. Helps with my glutes and hamstrings too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. I officiate basketball and I kee this in my bag wherever I go. Helps me get my muscles loose before getting on the court. My wife loves it when I’m home. Defiantly worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Twall

customer_reviews.title: 40 Days and broken
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 40 days and went to use it tonight. Something has broken on the inside and it is VERY loud now and unusable. This was an expensive item and should last much longer that less than 1 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 day. 2nd day something broke inside and it started making a awful noise. Not useable ordered a replacement. Let's home it's also not a lemon. I have a Vyper and have also got one for my sister. They both work great. Not sure about the hypersphere.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It is a strong massager and the adjustable level helps to determine the degree of pain my clients have after their training sessions, however it literally broke after 3 months and for that price I will not purchase it again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Lauren Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t charge. Replacement was sent. Worked well but not for long. Used several times, something was rattling inside it and it stopped working completely. Rarely used
customer_reviews.author: Deeds

customer_reviews.title: Great concept/poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, it's a fantastic product but unfortunately something on the inside broke or came lose and my bad I didnt send in the warranty $150 down the drain , normally a good brand
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on after charging
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this in the past and liked it so I bought one. However, it would not turn on after we charged it. I cannot return it to Amazon because it contains a flammable liquid, so someone has to stay home for them to pick it up. This is very inconvenient. Consider this before you spend the money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. You don't have to roll as long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. You don't have to roll as long as you would on a regular ball; the vibrations make your muscles feel looser the more you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: This thing works crazy good. I like the low setting for my neck and shoulders. My pilates instructor recommended and it works for pretty much every muscle group from shoulders to feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 2 weeks. Used it 3 times making sure to only use as directed and now the vibration unit is malfunctioning. Will be calling customer service and probably get the same headaches as all the other 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Noisy worthless and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I urge you to listen to the sound of this wonderfully crappy waste of money. If you think you are buying a quality product, think again.
customer_reviews.author: RedPanda

customer_reviews.title: Strong vibration
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I just wish my problems were more amenable to this therapy. It is strong and vibrates strong enough to be transmitted to other areas in the house. Sometimes that is annoying to other family members though.
customer_reviews.author: Clynro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he LOVES it!!!! He's a triathlon coach so is really picky about the equipment he purchases. I scored big time points with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cid

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Good battery life. WIll look for more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I use this with the original hyperice foam roller, I am less sore after workouts, it kind of amazed me! Expensive, but as long as the motor lasts it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: zensm

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Like others have written, the ball works great except because of the on/off button placement, it does turn itself off during use. That is why only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: No more knots
customer_reviews.text: My trainer uses it on me after all workouts and its awesome. It works! So I finally got one to have at home my husband and son use it all the time. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is like a 5 horse power motor
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like a 5 horse power motor. If you are using a lacrosse or a ball to work out knots ...this is the product for you! I guarantee if you use it once you will buy one for a friend. I bought everyone in my family one!
customer_reviews.author: Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price, high tech equipment thst should be in your workout
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for movinng lymph snd other toxins out of the body after surgery
customer_reviews.author: Roni L. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Fradulent seller
customer_reviews.text: Fradulent seller and product. This is not sold by hyperice and hyperice will not warranty this product
customer_reviews.author: Lexicon Devil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible breaks not 2 months in...
customer_reviews.text: Got this May 15th, already broken. The inside cracks and shakes around and it is all weak and loud. My buddy ordered one and his came like that and Ahmad has to order a replacement. Now mine not even 2 months old is all the sudden loud and weak. I hope the manufacturer contacts me to fix!
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing massager! It has 3 speeds and it really ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing massager! It has 3 speeds and it really does the job on sore muscles or painful areas. It is small and the round shape makes it easy to get to hard to reach places. It is a bit heavy, but not hard to manipulate it. I lovve mine!! Recommended by my chiro, and he has one in his office I was able to try first.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: great device and many flexible uses
customer_reviews.text: I had contemplated getting a foot massager to increase circulation and bring relief to tired feet. My PT suggested that is device is useful for many parts of body (including feet) so I decided to give it a try. Have already appreciated being able to use on hip/glute to relieve overuse/over sitting. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: F. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I had a massage after using it
customer_reviews.text: I loves this ball! I use it every night for 15 minutes to get rid of my knots on the upper back. I feel like I had a massage after using it. It's expensive but it's worth the money. You will learn how to move your body to let it rub on the areas you want.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Vibrating Ball
customer_reviews.text: Well built ball and vibrates from low to really high. The thing is built like a brick SH$* House.....When my muscles are sore I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Malin

customer_reviews.title: Will not work.despite having charged battery
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for month of light use. Noticed it began to heat up. I let it sit for two months, tried charging the battery, but will not turn on despite all lights indicate battery is charged. There is no information on the companies website as to how to troubleshoot this product
customer_reviews.author: tony m garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this device to loosen tight muscles and tendons after a work-out. Works remarkably well. I also use the low-setting on to improve circulation to help to get rid of bruising. We only top up the charge maybe once a week. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Within 7 months the Hypersphere would not hold its charge and continues to decrease. Now at 7 months, upon using it after 2 days of being fully charged, it works for less than 5 minutes. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Still breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: 2nd hype rice ball I've ever bought. When it works it magical, literally the best trigger point release for attachment sites. My first one lasted 1 use before completely losing its ability to vibrate. This 2nd one lasted 2 months, now the motor on the inside is rattling around.
customer_reviews.author: M. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Can this please work?!?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May and used it twice and loved. I just now tried to use it and does NOT work! Very disappointed and trying to get a hold of vendor to resolve. Hope to be able to work this out.
customer_reviews.author: linda desantos

customer_reviews.title: It is very effective when it's on, but when ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very effective when it's on, but when you roll on the ball it changes speeds and even turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have it for 16 hours after using it and now it won't even cut on after being fully charged
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Horse

customer_reviews.title: Became very noisy within weeks
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine and then became very noisy, like something was out of balance. Never dropped or jarred in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Fred William Rodenhiser

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Battery lasts a long time. I bought it to help heal a pulled hamstring and it's helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cj Rich

customer_reviews.title: I’d like a replacement one
customer_reviews.text: My hyper sphere dies very fast. I’ll charge it for at least 2 hrs and it dies after using it once. It’s defective for sure. I’d like a replacement one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I’ve ever purchased for recovery
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I’ve ever purchased for recovery. The only thing that could have made it better is if it was the size of a lacrosse ball.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked great but after only 2 1/2 months something broke on the inside and started making a terrible rattling noise and it would no longer vibrate properly. Hopefully I can obtain a refund from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Rizmd

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Loud for home use.
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far but the vibrations are so loud they quite literally rattle the entire house. The green part could be a litttttttle softer.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: After finishing PT using this, I bought one for home. So glad I can continue to be helped by this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lopez

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about a month and it started to do strange thing like adjusting the speed and then shuting off. then one day I couldn't shut the thing off. I had the let the battery dye .I had to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Eric kreusch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product complete life saver saves me money on massages.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works... until it doesn't. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the first few months I had it. Then I didn't use it for a few months. Went back to it and it started rattling louder than before. I charged it up to see if that would fix it. Now it doesn't turn on anymore. I took care of it too (e.g. careful that it didn't drop abruptly to the ground). I'm only 145 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C

customer_reviews.title: great muscle recovery
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful way to recover my muscles. even just holding it for my sore fingers due to gi gripping in BJJ. does wonders
customer_reviews.author: K. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge after 4 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in January. As of May 5, it's dead. won't hold a charge. $148?? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: High dollar, high value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective massage tool. My husband took it now and he won’t give it back so I might have to order a second one!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Needs A 3 Year Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product November 2016 and used it a a few times each month since. It broke yesterday. The warranty is 1 year. When this works it does a great job. I dont see any reason to buy another one. It's a waste of money without a 3 year warranty. Sad to report it's not built for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Source One MRO

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and no vibration
customer_reviews.text: Wld give zero stars. Bought in June and Dow does not work. Will check and see if I can get replacement.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those of us still working out into our ...
customer_reviews.text: This does everything I need it to, and more. Highly recommended for those of us still working out into our " more experienced " years.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! It has given me more relief than the $3000. massage chair I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Product breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice. Both times the ball broke itself within the first use. The inside breaks, causing massive noise during vibration, then the ball eventually stops working all together within subsequent uses. Used as intended, I weigh 180lbs - product has serious design flaws
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ferbert

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tool for breaking up adhesions, especially for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful tool for breaking up adhesions, especially for plantar fasciitis. I hope future versions will have an slightly more supple exterior for greater comfort when using against the floor on larger body parts. A must have for body work therapists and active individuals motivated for self care.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight and great it you have back/hip pain
customer_reviews.text: worth the cash. Heavy weight and great it you have back/hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Boggy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: First one broke (makes loud rattling sound) within 30 days, so I was in luck... Well! Not so much with the replacement, broke after 60 days, so I am out of luck....
customer_reviews.author: Van Chau

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought January 19th, return window closed February 17th, ball broke early March.
customer_reviews.author: Ready to Run

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The ball is working great but stop working after tow months. such a waste of money for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Team secret weapon
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time i bought it in high school but now its a mainstay at my collegiate track meets any my teammates all want one.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac N.

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old, doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a little over a year ago, and now the ball doesn't work. The lights make it appear to be charging, but when you try to turn it on... nothing. It used to be amazing. One day it just quit.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Older athletes need this
customer_reviews.text: love, love this !!! you need it for any joint pain or tightness you have
customer_reviews.author: TAR

customer_reviews.title: The deep tissue massage lessens my back pain pretty well so I’ve been using it almost every day ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m enjoying the experience so far. The deep tissue massage lessens my back pain pretty well so I’ve been using it almost every day since receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Soooo good!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent addition to the recovery routing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've used many foam rollers and myo-fascial release products, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used many foam rollers and myo-fascial release products, but this one has the added component of the vibration. The vibration seems to help increase blood flow, and allow for more relaxation and release. I appreciate it has a rechargeable battery that shows charge status.
customer_reviews.author: catedvindi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This broke after only using it about 10 times. The
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: He says it was the best present he ever got
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He says it was the best present he ever got. He has to fight with his teenage daughter over who gets it next. Hands can go numb if you’re rolling it over a body part on the highest setting. Well worth the $150.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Product was really great until it abruptly stopped holding a charge. We used it very gently maybe 1x per week over the course of a year and now it's completely worthless. I've switched back to using my Orb foam ball instead.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Toplin

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend using it up against the wall because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my upper back but it's just too difficult to use for the price. I don't recommend using it up against the wall because it is loud and will probably damage the wall over time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it works very well.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works well. Had a problem with the on-off button since day one. Now, it won’t even turn on. Haven’t been able to use it for 6 months. Too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it...especially the fact that it's the right size to take anywhere with me. I use it before and after my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This vibration sphere is one solid beast! I've had it for a couple of months now and have definitely noticed improvement to my targeted muscles. Get it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice. plug it in and will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Hyperice Hypersphere Vibrating Therapy Ball
feature_bullets: WARRANTY ONLY VALID THROUGH HYPERICE AND ACTIVE RECOVERY ESSENTIALS. As featured in Men's Fitness, Shape, Cosmopolitan, Men's Health, Muscle and Fitness, Women's Health, ESPN and Inc. Magazine.
ADVANCED DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY: Digital Circuitry Controls w/ 3 Vibrating Speed Settings to release sore muscles. Warranty only valid through HYPERICE and ACTIVE RECOVERY sellers
POWERFUL AND RECHARGEABLE: Rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery w/ Power Indicator Lights (2+ Hours of Use Per Charge)
HIGH INTENSITY VIBRATION: High-Intensity Vibrating Core Transfers Maximum Vibration to the Body for relief and activation
COMPACT AND PORTABLE: Compact Size - 5" (12.7 cm), great for travel and trigger point relief
